type.name: T:Elysium.Notifications.HorizontalPlacement
type.summary: Defines, by which side of the screen notifications are aligned.

field.name: F:Elysium.Notifications.HorizontalPlacement.Left
field.summary: Notifications are aligned by the left side of the screen.

field.name: F:Elysium.Notifications.HorizontalPlacement.Right
field.summary: Notifications are aligned by the right side of the screen.
